name: Gilded Dreams
title: Golden Vision: Gilded Dreams
desc: "Some time later, absurd decisions would be issued alongside illusory madness, using lovely expectations as bait to lead the people towards a bitter end."
in_play_description: When the character to which this card is attached is your active character, then when an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Draw 1 card. (Up to twice per Round)

skills.desc:
When played: Generate 1 Die of the same Element as the attached character. If you have 3 different Elemental Types in your party, generate 1 Omni Element in addition to this.
When the character to which this card is attached is your active character, then when an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction DMG: Draw 1 card. (Up to twice per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
